query:
UPDATE project p
                SET
                    name = COALESCE($2, name),
                    description = COALESCE($3, description),
                    image_url = COALESCE($4, image_url),
                    color = COALESCE($5, color),
                    completed = COALESCE($6, completed)
                WHERE id = $1
                    AND user_id = $7
                RETURNING 
                    id, 
                    name,
                    description, 
                    image_url, 
                    color, 
                    completed, 
                    user_id, 
                    created_at, 
                    updated_at
